mapper.insert:
select product_seq.nextval from dual
insert into product_tb(oid, title, description, price, delivery_fee, reg_date, pub_oid, category_oid, sub_title, contents, author_oid) values (#{oid}, #{title}, #{description}, #{price}, #{deliveryFee}, sysdate, #{pubOid}, #{categoryOid}, #{subTitle}, #{contents}, #{authorOid})
mapper.update: update product_tb set title = #{title}, description = #{description}, price = #{price}, delivery_fee = #{deliveryFee}, pub_oid = #{pubOid}, category_oid = #{categoryOid}, sub_title= #{subTitle}, contents = #{contents}, author_oid = #{authorOid} where oid = #{oid}
mapper.select: select a.oid, a.title, a.sub_title, a.price, a.delivery_fee, a.description, a.contents, b.name as author_name, b.description as author_desc , c.name as pub_name, d.path as rep_uri, e.path as desc_uri, f.name as category_name from product_tb a, author_tb b, pub_tb c, image_product_tb d, image_product_tb e, category_tb f where (a.oid = #{oid}) and (a.author_oid = b.oid) and (a.pub_oid = c.oid) and (a.oid = d.product_oid AND d.image_list_oid = 2) and (a.oid = e.product_oid AND e.image_list_oid = 3) and (a.category_oid = f.oid)
